name: familienkasse-insert-mongodb-function
description: Function to insert data via cloud scheduler and Pub/Sub
author: Christoph Weissteiner

scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run compile -- --watch" "nodemon --watch ./build/ --exec npm run debug"
scripts.debug: export MONGO_DB_USER=$(gcloud secrets versions access 1 --secret='wfk-mongo-user') && export MONGO_DB_PASSWORD=$(gcloud secrets versions access 1 --secret='wfk-mongo-password') && export DB_NAME=familienkasse_test && functions-framework --source=build/src/ --target=insertData
